entrance.description: You are at the entrance of a dark cave. No Treasure in sight! There are passages to the north and east.

cave1.description: You are in a dim lit cave. DEAD END!!! Head back south.

cave2.description: You are in a spooky cavern. I can see a faint gimmer of shiny stuff!! You can either go west and south.

treasure_room.description: You have found the treasure room! Congratulations, you win! Don't stay too long, you might run into a pirate!!
